archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0990
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require the ability to change the start date of new accounts for backdating of services to cater for accounts that go into receivership so that we can ensure a clean cutover from old account to receivers account

properties.value: Waiting for clarification and example for backdating.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
